title: how can you become a PBE tester

replies.body: You can apply to become a PBE tester [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)!  An application isn't instant and not guaranteed, but applying is the first step.  Good luck!
{{item:3070}} Yeah takes time been waiting like 2 years just gave up on it  {{item:3070}}
